channel.title: Mod-admin-banning owner
channel.description:
Is their a way to make it to where mods/admins cannot be owner? or just mod not able to?
Sorry. It's [PI] server

item.title: Mod-admin-banning owner
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Oh, ignore my post above. I saw “be” in his post, and didn’t talk about “ban” in his title. I was just confused

Anyways…just do what the guy above me said ^_^. Another hint is use it in the execution of your commands (i.e.- ban, mute, etc.)

Read full topic

item.title: Mod-admin-banning owner

item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your name")) return; // If you copy and paste this you're dumb enough for it to give errors. Learn to make it work with your server...

item.title: Mod-admin-banning owner
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:4, topic:406448”]You didn’t provide us with your source or your current code. How can we help

EDIT: You should be able to look at what mods can do and change the playerRights requirement to “>=1” for mods, “>=2” for admins, and “>=3” for owners. If it’s “>=” everyone will have the same power. Please post your code if this isn’t the case (I don’t work with PI).

Another option instead of “>=3” is “==3” if that helps…[/quote]
What the fuck does that mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Mod-admin-banning owner
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:4, topic:406448”]You didn’t provide us with your source or your current code. How can we help

EDIT: You should be able to look at what mods can do and change the playerRights requirement to “>=1” for mods, “>=2” for admins, and “>=3” for owners. If it’s “>=” everyone will have the same power. Please post your code if this isn’t the case (I don’t work with PI).

Another option instead of “>=3” is “==3” if that helps…[/quote]
That does not help at all, he’s talking about mods/admins not banning owner, not the player rights requirements.

Read full topic

@Billy_Mays wrote:

Well theres no big deal if you get banned by a staff member because you have the source files and you can just Un-ban yourself from the folders.

item.title: Mod-admin-banning owner
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

You didn’t provide us with your source or your current code. How can we help

EDIT: You should be able to look at what mods can do and change the playerRights requirement to “>=1” for mods, “>=2” for admins, and “>=3” for owners. If it’s “>=” everyone will have the same power. Please post your code if this isn’t the case (I don’t work with PI).

Another option instead of “>=3” is “==3” if that helps…

Read full topic
